pr_title: feat: Remove username from user invitation link

timeline.message:
DHIS-8096 re commit

Signed-off-by: Morten Svanaes <msvanaes@dhis2.org>

feat: Remove username from user invitation link

Remove username from invitation URL to prevent MITM attack snooping username.
Use usercredential's "secret" property together with restore token.
Secret is used for looking up the user.

Issue: [DHIS2-8096]
Signed-off-by: Morten Svanaes <msvanaes@dhis2.org>

timeline.bodyText: Do you know why we get a complete diff on this file, line ending issue?

timeline.bodyText: Let's introduce a new property for this we use only for invites/password reset. The secret field is used as a shared secret for 2FA and we should be very careful not expose it through the API at all.
timeline.author: larshelge

replies.bodyText: New property made, the name is "idtoken", I also removed an old property not in use anymore called "restorecode"
replies.author: netroms
